required_outline.I. Executive Summary: One- to three-page description of the project

II. Introduction.A. Description of the business or organi: Description of the business or organization
II. Introduction.B. Description of the target market: Demographics and psychographics of the target market
II. Introduction.C. Overview of current business strategy: Overview of the business or organization's current business strategy relating to corporate social responsibility initiatives

III. Research Methods Used in the Study.A. Description and rationale of research: Description and rationale of research methodologies selected to conduct the research study
III. Research Methods Used in the Study.B. Process used to conduct the selected: Process used to conduct the selected research methods

V. Proposed Strategic Plan.A. Objectives and rationale of the propo: Objectives and rationale of the proposed strategic plan
V. Proposed Strategic Plan.C. Proposed metrics or key performance i: Proposed metrics or key performance indicators to measure plan effectiveness

required_outline.VII. Bibliography: A bibliography is required. Include a list of the sources of information used in the written document.
required_outline.VIII. Appendix: An appendix is optional. If additional material is appended, all pages must be numbered. Include exhibits appropriate to the written entry but not important enough to include in the body (e.g. sample questionnaires, letters, background data, minutes of meetings).

sections.name: Executive Summary
sections.description: One- to three-page description of the project

sections.name: Introduction
sections.description: Description of the business or organization; description of the target market (demographics and psychographics); overview of the business or organization's current business strategy relating to corporate social responsibility initiatives

sections.name: Research Methods Used in the Study
sections.description: Description and rationale of research methodologies selected to conduct the research study; process used to conduct the selected research methods

sections.name: Findings and Conclusions of the Study
sections.description: Findings of the research study; conclusions based on the findings

sections.name: Proposed Strategic Plan
sections.description: Objectives and rationale of the proposed strategic plan; proposed activities and timelines; proposed metrics or key performance indicators to measure plan effectiveness

sections.name: Appearance and Word Usage
sections.description: Professional layout, neatness, proper grammar, spelling and word usage
